products.name: Black Coffee
products.description: Experience the bold and robust flavor of our classic Black Coffee. Sourced from the finest coffee beans and carefully brewed to perfection.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Indulge in the rich and creamy delight of our Cappuccino. A perfect blend of espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam for a luxurious coffee experience.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Elevate your senses with the intense and concentrated flavor of our Espresso. Specially crafted for those who appreciate the pure essence of coffee.

products.name: Latte
products.description: Savor the smooth and velvety goodness of our Latte. A harmonious blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a creamy layer for a delightful taste.

products.name: Mocha
products.description: Indulge in the irresistible fusion of chocolate and coffee with our Mocha. A decadent treat that combines the richness of cocoa with the boldness of espresso.
